pullrequest.title: Possibility to enforce contact addition in ContactManager even if there are no subscribers

content.raw:
The additions looks good to me. I only have a couple comments about doxygen and a const function.

It would be nice if we could add a small test to `UNIT_ContactManager_TEST` to make sure we don't break the new behavior in the future.
content.html:
The additions looks good to me. I only have a couple comments about doxygen and a const function.

It would be nice if we could add a small test to UNIT_ContactManager_TEST to make sure we don't break the new behavior in the future.
